name: Santa Backrooms
description:
Axel who has become trapped in the backrooms of a haunted building

Axel must navigate through a series of dark and twisted corridors, trying to stay one step ahead of Santa. Along the way, they must gather items and clues that will help them solve puzzles and unlock doors to new areas.

Will you be able to outsmart the Crazy Santa and find your way out of the backrooms, or will you become its next victim?

You can  Save&Load Game use Flashlight collect Keys solve Puzzles and more
